title: Enhancing CS Practical Competencies: Project-Based Learning Design for Creative Capacity Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze their creative thinking patterns and establish improvement plans through structured questionnaires.
Learners can maintain motivation and academic engagement during collaborative projects to derive creative problem-solving solutions.
Learners can complete language-based creative outputs (e.g., digital storytelling) using digital tools and perform improvements based on feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
